mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.order_id, a.goods_mapping_id, b.goods_id, b.goods_name as "goodsName", b.goods_num as "goodsNum", b.spec_key, b.spec_key_name as "specName", b.cost_price AS "costPrice", b.market_price AS "marketPrice", b.goods_price AS "goodsPrice", b.ratio, b.ratio_price as "ratioPrice", SUM(f.app_total_amount) AS 'totalAmount', b.order_amount as "orderAmount", b.order_balance, b.order_arrearage, b.service_times as "serviceTimes", a.user_id, d.nickname as "userName", d.mobile, b.is_real, a.problem_desc as "problemDesc", a.refusal_cause as "refusalCause", a.audit_by, a.audit_date, a.apply_type, a.return_num, a.apply_date, a.return_reason, a.return_amount, a.warehouse_id, a.is_storage, a.return_status, a.receipt_by, a.financial_by, a.update_by, a.update_date, a.office_id, a.remarks, a.shipper_by, a.consigner_name, a.consigner_address, a.consigner_shipping_name, a.consigner_shipping_code, a.consigner_shipping_time, a.consigner_shipping_img, a.shipping_name, a.shipping_code, a.shipping_time, a.shipper_date, e.`name` as "hoseName", e.governor, e.address, a.channel_flag AS 'channelFlag', a.receive_name, a.receive_account, a.return_type FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping b ON a.goods_mapping_id=b.rec_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_franchisee c ON a.office_id=c.id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users d ON a.user_id=d.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_pd_warehouse e ON e.id=a.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details f ON a.order_id=f.order_id AND a.goods_mapping_id = f.goods_mapping_id WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.del_flag = 0
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods WHERE return_status IN (12,13,14,15,16) AND del_flag = 0 AND order_id= #{orderId} AND goods_mapping_id= #{goodsMappingId}

SELECT a.mapping_id AS 'goodsMappingId', a.returned_id AS 'returnedId', a.goods_name AS 'goodsName', b.goods_num AS 'goodsNum', SUM(a.return_num) AS 'returnNum' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods_card a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping b ON a.mapping_id = b.rec_id WHERE a.returned_id = #{id} AND a.is_real = 0 GROUP BY a.mapping_id

SELECT a.returned_id AS 'returnedId', a.mapping_id AS 'goodsMappingId', a.is_real AS 'isReal', a.return_num AS 'returnNum', a.goods_name AS 'goodsName' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods_card a WHERE a.returned_id = #{id}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(a.return_num),0) AS 'goodsNum' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods_card a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping b ON a.mapping_id = b.rec_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods c ON a.returned_id = c.id WHERE a.mapping_id = #{goodsMappingId} AND a.returned_id != #{returnedId} AND a.is_real = 0 AND c.return_status NOT IN (-10,-20,26)

SELECT a.rec_id AS 'goodsMappingId', a.is_real AS 'isReal', a.goods_name AS 'goodsName', (a.service_times -IFNULL(b.returnNum,0)) AS 'returnNum' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN (SELECT goods_mapping_id,count(1) returnNum FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order WHERE appt_status in (0,1,2,4) GROUP BY goods_mapping_id) b ON a.rec_id = b.goods_mapping_id WHERE a.order_id=#{orderId} AND a.group_id = #{goodsMappingId} AND a.is_real = 1 GROUP BY a.rec_id
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(a.return_amount),0) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods a WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.goods_mapping_id = #{goodsMappingId} AND a.return_status NOT IN (-10,-20,26)

SELECT a.order_id AS orderId, a.details_id AS detailsId, SUM(a.amount) AS amount, a.use_balance AS useBalance, a.user_id AS userId, a.user_office_id AS userOfficeId, a.user_beautician_id AS userBeauticianId, a.belong_office_id AS belongOfficeId, b.name AS belongOfficeName, a.belong_office_ids AS belongOfficeIds, a.create_by AS createBy, a.create_date AS createDate FROM mtmydb.mtmy_turnover_details a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office b ON a.belong_office_id = b.id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.del_flag = 0 AND a.belong_office_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY a.belong_office_id

SELECT a.order_id AS orderId, a.details_id AS detailsId, SUM(a.amount) AS amount, a.use_balance AS useBalance, a.user_id AS userId, a.user_office_id AS userOfficeId, a.user_beautician_id AS userBeauticianId, a.belong_office_id AS belongOfficeId, b.name AS belongOfficeName, a.belong_office_ids AS belongOfficeIds, a.create_by AS createBy, a.create_date AS createDate FROM mtmydb.mtmy_turnover_details a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office b ON a.belong_office_id = b.id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.details_id = #{detailsId} AND a.del_flag = 0 AND a.belong_office_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY a.belong_office_id

SELECT a.order_id AS orderId, a.details_id AS detailsId, SUM(a.amount) AS amount FROM mtmydb.mtmy_turnover_details a WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.details_id = #{detailsId} AND a.del_flag = 0 AND a.belong_office_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY a.belong_office_id

SELECT a.id AS detailsId, a.order_id AS orderId, a.goods_mapping_id AS mappingId, SUM(a.return_amount) AS amount, IFNULL(a.audit_date,a.apply_date) AS createDate FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods a WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.id = #{returnedId} AND a.del_flag = 0

SELECT r.id AS pushmoneyRecordId, r.order_id AS orderId, r.user_id AS pushmoneyUserId, SUM(r.push_money) AS pushMoney, r.create_by AS "createBy.id", r.create_date AS createDate, su1.`name` AS pushmoneyUserName, su1.mobile AS pushmoneyUserMobile, su2.`name` AS "createBy.name", td.`name` AS "departmentName" FROM mtmydb.mtmy_beautician_turnover r,trains.sys_user su1,trains.sys_user su2,trains.train_department td WHERE r.user_id = su1.id AND r.create_by = su2.id AND r.department_id = td.id AND r.order_id = #{orderId} AND r.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY r.department_id,r.user_id

SELECT u.id AS 'pushmoneyUserId', u.name AS 'pushmoneyUserName', d.name AS 'departmentName', u.mobile AS 'pushmoneyUserMobile', mbt.push_money AS 'pushMoney', mbt.create_by AS 'createBy.id', u1.name AS 'createBy.name', mbt.create_date AS 'createDate' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_beautician_turnover mbt LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user u ON u.id = mbt.user_id LEFT JOIN trains.train_department d ON d.id = mbt.department_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user u1 ON u1.id = mbt.create_by WHERE mbt.order_id = #{orderId} AND mbt.returned_id = #{returnedId} ORDER BY mbt.id DESC

SELECT a.order_id AS orderId, a.details_id AS detailsId, a.type, a.amount, a.use_balance AS useBalance, a.status, a.user_id AS userId, a.user_office_id AS userOfficeId, a.user_beautician_id AS userBeauticianId, a.belong_office_id AS belongOfficeId, a.belong_office_ids AS belongOfficeIds, a.create_by AS createBy, a.create_date AS createDate, b.name AS userName, c.name AS officeName, d.name AS beauticianName, e.name AS belongOfficeName, f.name AS createName FROM mtmydb.mtmy_turnover_details a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users b on a.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office c on a.user_office_id = c.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user d on a.user_beautician_id = d.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office e on a.belong_office_id = e.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user f on a.create_by = f.id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.details_id = #{detailsId} AND a.del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_turnover_details ( order_id, details_id, mapping_id, goods_id, type, amount, use_balance, status, user_id, belong_office_id, belong_office_ids, create_by, create_date, settle_by, settle_date, del_flag )VALUES( #{orderId}, #{detailsId}, #{mappingId}, #{goodsId}, #{type}, #{amount}, #{useBalance}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{belongOfficeId}, #{belongOfficeIds}, #{createBy.id}, SYSDATE(), #{createBy.id}, SYSDATE(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT r.order_id AS orderId, r.user_id AS pushmoneyUserId, SUM(r.push_money) AS pushMoney, r.department_id AS departmentId, su1.`name` AS pushmoneyUserName, su1.mobile AS pushmoneyUserMobile, td.`name` AS "departmentName", r.belong_office_id AS belongOfficeId, so.name AS belongOfficeName FROM mtmydb.mtmy_beautician_turnover r LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user su1 ON r.user_id = su1.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user su2 ON r.create_by = su2.id LEFT JOIN trains.train_department td ON r.department_id = td.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office so ON r.belong_office_id = so.id WHERE r.order_id = #{orderId} AND r.del_flag = 0 AND r.belong_office_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY r.department_id,r.user_id

SELECT r.order_id AS orderId, r.user_id AS pushmoneyUserId, SUM(r.push_money) AS pushMoney, r.department_id AS departmentId, su1.`name` AS pushmoneyUserName, su1.mobile AS pushmoneyUserMobile, td.`name` AS "departmentName", r.belong_office_id AS belongOfficeId, so.name AS belongOfficeName FROM mtmydb.mtmy_beautician_turnover r LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user su1 ON r.user_id = su1.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user su2 ON r.create_by = su2.id LEFT JOIN trains.train_department td ON r.department_id = td.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office so ON r.belong_office_id = so.id WHERE r.order_id = #{orderId} AND r.user_id = #{pushmoneyUserId} AND r.del_flag = 0 AND r.belong_office_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY r.belong_office_id

SELECT r.order_id AS orderId, r.user_id AS pushmoneyUserId, SUM(r.push_money) AS pushMoney, r.department_id AS departmentId, su1.`name` AS pushmoneyUserName, su1.mobile AS pushmoneyUserMobile, td.`name` AS "departmentName" FROM mtmydb.mtmy_beautician_turnover r LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user su1 ON r.user_id = su1.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user su2 ON r.create_by = su2.id LEFT JOIN trains.train_department td ON r.department_id = td.id WHERE r.order_id = #{orderId} AND r.returned_id = #{detailsId} AND r.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY r.department_id,r.user_id

SELECT r.order_id AS orderId, r.user_id AS pushmoneyUserId, SUM(r.push_money) AS pushMoney FROM mtmydb.mtmy_beautician_turnover r WHERE r.order_id = #{orderId} AND r.returned_id = #{detailsId} AND r.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY r.department_id,r.user_id

SELECT SUM(r.push_money) AS pushMoney, r.department_id AS departmentId FROM mtmydb.mtmy_beautician_turnover r LEFT JOIN trains.train_department td ON r.department_id = td.id WHERE r.order_id = #{orderId} AND r.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY r.department_id

SELECT SUM(r.push_money) AS pushMoney FROM mtmydb.mtmy_beautician_turnover r LEFT JOIN trains.train_department td ON r.department_id = td.id WHERE r.order_id = #{orderId} AND r.del_flag = 0 AND r.department_id = #{departmentId} AND (r.returned_id != #{returnedId} OR r.returned_id IS NULL)

SELECT r.id AS pushmoneyRecordId, r.order_id AS orderId, r.returned_id AS returnedId, r.turnover_details_id AS turnoverDetailsId, r.user_id AS pushmoneyUserId, r.belong_office_id as belongOfficeId, r.belong_office_ids as belongOfficeIds, r.position_key as positionKey, r.position_value as positionValue, r.department_id as departmentId, r.office_id as officeId FROM mtmydb.mtmy_beautician_turnover r LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user su1 ON r.user_id = su1.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user su2 ON r.create_by = su2.id LEFT JOIN trains.train_department td ON r.department_id = td.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office so ON r.belong_office_id = so.id WHERE r.order_id = #{orderId} AND r.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY r.department_id,r.user_id,r.belong_office_id

FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping b ON a.goods_mapping_id=b.rec_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_franchisee c ON a.office_id=c.id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users d ON a.user_id=d.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_pd_warehouse e ON e.id=a.warehouse_id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderid} AND a.return_status IN (11,21) AND a.del_flag=0

SELECT , IF(a.id = (SELECT aa.id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods aa WHERE aa.order_id = a.order_id AND aa.goods_mapping_id = a.goods_mapping_id AND aa.return_status IN (12,13,14,15,16) ORDER BY aa.apply_date ASC LIMIT 1), (SELECT -SUM(de.app_arrearage) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details de WHERE de.order_id = a.order_id AND de.goods_mapping_id = a.goods_mapping_id AND de.advance_flag = '5') ,0) AS 'floatArreageMoney' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping b ON a.goods_mapping_id=b.rec_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_franchisee c ON a.office_id=c.id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users d ON a.user_id=d.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_pd_warehouse e ON e.id=a.warehouse_id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.del_flag=0 ORDER BY a.apply_date DESC
